Clean beach, great to run along. Enjoyed the sun rise as you run along the Marina. Lovely atmosphere.

Good beach, what you would expect and not as crowded as Venice beach

Go left at the pier and enjoy less of the hustle and bustle you find at Venice. Great for families and people looking for less crowds. Especially quiet on weekdays!

Marina Beach, Mother's Beach.address: 4101 Admiralty Way , Marina del Rey , CA 90292-6206

California Sailing Academy.address: 14025 Panay Way , Marina del Rey , CA 90292-4102
reviewComments: This place is fantastic for beginners to advance and has wonderful staff. The prices are reasonable also and always have summer specials so well worth the money. 5 stars!

UCLA Marina Aquatic Center.address: 14001 Fiji Way , Marina del Rey , CA 90292-6955
reviewComments: Nice affordable place to rent kayaks from. The staff is helpful and pleasant. We have rented from here thrice and have had a good experience every time.

Burton W. Chace Park.address: 13650 Mindanao Way , Marina del Rey , CA 90292
reviewComments: Burton Chase Park is not a "destination spot" per say but it is a nice spot to pause, sit and relax, people watch and take a break!

This is a favorite spot to spend 4th of July with friends. $10 event parking if you get there early.
